posts.post_content:
New addition: SGC 40 Danny Murphy.

I also have a dozen more lower-grade T205's listed below that I'd like to sell or trade for ones I need of equal value.   

New Addition: Beals Becker,

Bergen, back damage,
Berger [2], one with back damage,
Lennox,
Kroh,
Meyers,
BENDER,
TINKER,--ON HOLD--
Shean [trimmed on top],
Payne,
Austin,
Murphy, back damage.

I need about half the set, and I prefer ungraded cards.  If you're interested in trading please send me a list of what you have. 

No pm's, please; my box is always nearly full.  Post here or email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url]. 

Thanks.

Doug
Looking for someone out there to trade lower-grade T205's!
What are you looking for on the Bender?

Preferably a trade--for T205's, 206's, or any equivalent, pre-war hall-of-famer I need.
If you have nothing to trade, I'll sell.

One has to wonder how a card with that many creases has still managed to survive in one piece!  

Email your reply to [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url], please.

Thanks.

Doug

Tinker on Hold.
New Additions: Beals Becker, SGC 40 Danny Murphy.
